mapper.select: /* selectMatchedLogByAuid */ SELECT A.PLTFOM_TP_CODE, A.ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, A.ADVRTS_TP_CODE, A.CTGR_SEQ, A.KPI_NO, A.SITE_CODE, A.MEDIA_TP_CODE, A.MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, A.ITL_TP_CODE, A.UNEXPOSURE_YN, A.MEDIA_ID, A.DIFF_SEND_DTTM, A.LOG_DTTM, A.SEND_DTTM, A.POS_IP_INFO FROM (SELECT PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, CTGR_SEQ, KPI_NO, SITE_CODE, MEDIA_TP_CODE, MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, ITL_TP_CODE, UNEXPOSURE_YN, MEDIA_ID, SEND_DTTM, date_diff(SECOND, SEND_DTTM, toDateTime(#{sendDate}, 'Asia/Seoul')) AS DIFF_SEND_DTTM, formatDateTime(SEND_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', 'Asia/Seoul') AS LOG_DTTM, CASE WHEN IP = '' THEN 0 ELSE position(#{ipInfoList}, IP) END AS POS_IP_INFO FROM default.BRAND_CAMP_MEDIA_LOG WHERE STATS_DTTM BETWEEN ${indirectDttm} AND ${yyyymmdd} AND ADVER_ID = #{advertiserId} AND AU_ID = #{auId} AND TOT_EPRS_CNT > 0) AS A ORDER BY A.SEND_DTTM DESC LIMIT 1;
